name: Flightera Flight Data
description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera

api_methods.name: airlineStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

utterances.utterance: Can you provide detailed statistics for the airline with ICAO code AAL?
Show me the current day's performance data for the airline identified by the IATA code DAL.
I want to see the airline statistics for the airline with the ident code UA123.
Get me the on-time performance and flight status for the airline with ICAO code AFRR.
Please provide the detailed airline statistics for the airline with IATA code KLM.
What are the current statistics for the airline identified by the ident code BA456?
Retrieve the flight status and on-time performance for the airline with ICAO code JBUA.
I need detailed statistics for the airline with IATA code ANA.
Show me the airline statistics for the airline identified by the ident code LH789.
Can you get the current day's airline statistics for the airline with ICAO code QFAU?

api_methods.name: airportDelayDailyStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed daily delay statistics for an airport identified by the provided identifiers. If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided. Additionally, `dt` and `isDeparture` are required.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the data for the specific date.

parameters.name: isDeparture
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the desired statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The date for which delay statistics are desired, formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

utterances.utterance: Show me the departure delay statistics for the airport with ident JFK on 2024-05-01.
I want to see arrival delay data for the airport identified as LAX on 2024-04-15.
Get me the departure delay statistics for the airport with ident CDG on 2024-06-10.
Provide arrival delay statistics for the airport identified as SFO on 2024-03-20.
I need the departure delay statistics for the airport with ident ORD on 2024-07-04.
Show arrival delay statistics for the airport identified as ATL on 2024-05-15.
Get departure delay data for the airport with ident DXB on 2024-08-01.
Please provide arrival delay statistics for the airport identified as HND on 2024-09-10.
I want to see departure delay statistics for the airport with ident LHR on 2024-10-05.
Show me arrival delay statistics for the airport identified as MIA on 2024-11-20.
